short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a todo list with timer. No subscription needed. To support this please send me an email.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Version 0.0.0.3
Added Features:
1. Task completion percentage
2. Total Elapsed Time

Version 0.0.0.4
Bug fix:
1. Progress not loading after deleting task.

Version 0.0.0.5
Added Feature:
1. Conversion of hours to equivalent base 1 value when hovered to elapsed time.

Version 0.0.0.6
Bug Fix:
    1. Failure in loading CSS after pop-up.
Enhancements:
    1. From hour based timer (hh:mm:ss) to base 1 timer (0-1).
    2. Disabled textareas after playing/running a task.
    3. Added date on the export file name.
Version 0.0.0.7
Bug Fix:
    1. Failure in creating new tasks.
